A class that represents a single 2012 'Rebound Rumble' rectangular target. More...

 The X, Y, and Z offsets of the target from the camera.

 The Aruco Marker object defining the square portion of the target coplanar with the target and aligned with the target's left edge.

 The OpenGL model view matrix of the target, in a 3x3 rotation matrix appended to a 3x1 translation matrix.

void mergeColinearLines ()
 Merges all colinear line segments into a single segment; one for each edge of the target.

 Intersects vanishing ponts to get the four corners of the target.
void calculateSquare ()
 Calculates the corners of the square Marker object. Performs two dicing operations on the four corner points to create an Aruco Marker object, square, centered on the left edge of the target.

 Calculates the position of the target's hoop from the Aruco marker object.

 The number of Line objects contained in lineSet.
CvPoint2D32f intersectionSet [1000]
 The set of floating-point CvPoints defining the intersection of the edges of the target.
int numIntersections
 The number of intersections between the target's edges.
int intersectionLineIndices [2][1000]
 An array that indicates which lines formed each intersection points. The first column contains the first line that formed the given intersection point,the second column the second line, and each row is used for a single intersection point.
CvPoint2D32f vPointArray [2]
 An array of CvPoint2D32f's defining the two vanishing points of the target's parallel lines.
Line vLines [4]
 An array of Line objects, two per vanishing point- one for each line that creaed that vanishing point via intersection.
CvPoint2D32f cornerArray [4]
 The four corners of the target, in CvPoint2D32f format.
float hoopCoordinatesArray [16]

Detailed Description

A class that represents a single 2012 'Rebound Rumble' rectangular target.

Author:
Nick Royer

Definition at line 22 of file Target.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Target::Target (  ) 

Constructs an empty Target object.

Constructs a new Target object with a null contour pointer.

Target::Target ( CvSeq *  cntr  ) 

Creates a target from a CvSeq contour.

Constructs a new Target objec using the given pointer to a contour. Ideally, the contour should belong to an actual target. This method assumes the given contour is correct; no filtering methods are performed.

Parameters:
cntr The contour that the target will represent.

Member Function Documentation

void Target::calculateCornersFromVanishingPoints (  )  [private]

Intersects vanishing ponts to get the four corners of the target.

See also:
vPointArray
void Target::calculateHoopPosition ( int  numPointsPerSide,
int  crossProductThreshold,
aruco::CameraParameters  camParams 
)

Calculates the position of the hoop relative to the camera.

Calculates the position, in inches, of the target's hoop center and stores it in an array of X,Y,Z and vector offsets.

Parameters:
numPointsPerSide The number of points desired on the shortest side of the target's contour when spacing the points evenly.
crossProductThreshold A scalar value used to filter out non-colinear lines from the target's segment array. A very low number will filter few lines. A very high number will filter out most lines.
camParams The Aruco camera parameters used in determining the target's position.
See also:
spacePointsEvenly
calculateSegmentsFromPoints
calculateIntersectionsOfLines
calculateVanishingPoints
calculateCornersFromVanishingPoints
calculateSquare
calculatePosition

void Target::calculateSegmentsFromPoints ( int  crossProductThreshold  )  [private]

Makes the set of segments on a target from points.

Parameters:
crossProductThreshold An integer value defining the threshold for filtering out non-colinear line segments.
See also:
lineSet
void Target::calculateSquare (  )  [private]

Calculates the corners of the square Marker object. Performs two dicing operations on the four corner points to create an Aruco Marker object, square, centered on the left edge of the target.

See also:
marker
vPointArray
void Target::calculateVanishingPoints (  )  [private]

Calculates vanishing pints from the segments contained in lineSet.

See also:
lineSet
void Target::drawTarget ( IplImage *  img,
CvScalar  color 
)

Draws the target on an image.

Draws the target on a provided image, including the target's bounding box, center, axes of rotation, contour, and selected points.

Parameters:
img The pointer to an IplImage that the target is to be drawn on.
color A CvScalar defining the desired color of the target's bounding box, contour, and points. Note that all X,Y,Z values are rendered in their conventional colors.

int Target::intersectionLineIndices[2][1000] [private]

An array that indicates which lines formed each intersection points. The first column contains the first line that formed the given intersection point,the second column the second line, and each row is used for a single intersection point.
